Reference

Annotations

Functions used to annotate GAMBL data.

annotate_driver_ssm()

Annotate Driver SSM.

annotate_hotspots()

Annotate Hotspots.

annotate_igh_breakpoints()

Annotate IGH Breakpoints.

annotate_recurrent_cnv()

Annotate Recurrent CNVs.

annotate_ssm_blacklist()

Annotate SSM with Blacklists

annotate_sv()

Annotate SVs.

Bundled Data

This is the bundled data used by GAMBLR.

chromosome_arms_grch37

Chromosome Arms grch37.

chromosome_arms_hg38

Chromosome Arms hg38.

dhitsig_genes_with_weights

Double Hit Signature Genes With Weights.

gene_blacklist

Genes Blacklist.

grande_maf

Grande et al. MAF.

grch37_all_gene_coordinates

Gene Coordinates for grch37 (all).

grch37_ashm_regions

grch37 ASHM Regions.

grch37_gene_coordinates

grch37 Gene Coordinates.

grch37_lymphoma_genes_bed

Lymphoma Genes (grch37).

grch37_oncogene

Oncogenes in grch37 genome build.

grch37_partners

grch37 Partner Genes.

hg38_ashm_regions

hg38 ASHM Regions.

hg38_gene_coordinates

hg38 Gene Coordinates.

hg38_lymphoma_genes_bed

Lymphoma Genes (hg38).

hg38_oncogene

Oncogenes in hg38 genome build.

hg38_partners

hg38 Partner Genes.

hotspot_regions_grch37

grch37 Hotspot Regions.

hotspot_regions_hg38

hg38 Hotspot Regions.

lymphoma_genes

Lymphoma Genes

lymphoma_genes_comprehensive

Lymphoma Genes Comprehensive.

reddy_genes

Reddy Genes.

target_regions_grch37

Target Regions grch37.

target_regions_hg38

Target Regions hg38.

wright_genes_with_weights

Wright Genes With Weights.

cBioPortal

Functions tailored to setting up a new study or updating an existing cBioPortal instance.

cbioportal_create()

Create cBioPortal Study.

custom_caselist()

Custom cBioPortal case list.

finalize_study()

Finalize Study (cBioPortal).

get_study_info()

Get Study Info.

setup_expreession_data()

Setup Expression Data (cBioPortal).

setup_fusions()

Setup Fusions (cBioPortal).

setup_study()

Setup Study (cBioPortal).

study_check()

Study Check (cBioPortal).
